item.title: Introduction
item.author: karl.hepworth@gmail.com (Karl Hepworth)
item.description: I’m Karl and I’m a technologist who primarily works with PHP and Go, however I’m quite familiar with Java, Ruby, JavaScript/Nodejs, Bash and various other languages, and I’m in the process of learning Crystal and Rust. I’m employed to work with Drupal as a specialist, and I’m an advocate of the proverbs and values supported by the Go programming language. In the Drupal space, I have extensive experience with administration, site building, themes, modules (custom and contributed), back-end, release management etc.

item.title: About me
item.author: karl.hepworth@gmail.com (Karl Hepworth)
item.description: I’m Karl, and I’m a passionate technologist who loves programming languages and tooling. I primarily work with automation, Drupal and of course the Go programming language. I love to learn new technologies and challenge myself with operational work. Challenges are of great interest to me, I love to understand the root cause of problems. Challenges with my expertise are also hard to come by in my industry. values A lot of my professional values are encompassed by the principals presented by the Go programming language.
